criteria.details: Human score: 0.90 - Excellent coverage. Correctly identifies Senior Leverage Ratio ≤ 3.50x general test, Credit Facility basket of $2,250M plus greater of ($700M less Notes) or 75% EBITDA, First Lien Leverage Ratio ≤ 3.00x for additional amounts, Secured Leverage Ratio ≤ 6.00x for acquired debt and junior lien debt (clause xxix), general basket of greater of $400M or 40% EBITDA (clause xv), and non-guarantor cap of greater of $50M or 5% EBITDA (clause xxvi). All key ratios, thresholds, and 'greater of' mechanics accurately captured. Minor nuance: could note that clause (i)(z) allows unlimited additional Credit Facility debt if First Lien Leverage ≤ 3.00x, not just a single additional amount.

criteria.description: Captures debt incurrence tests, key baskets, leverage thresholds, and non-guarantor caps from Section 4.05
criteria.scoring_guide: Score 0-1 based on completeness and accuracy versus the criterion description.

criteria.details: Human score: 0.85 - Strong coverage of RP mechanics. Correctly identifies $300M starter basket (clause B(1)), builder basket using cumulative EBITDA from Q1 2021 minus 1.70x cumulative interest expense (clause B(3)), general basket of greater of $150M or 15% EBITDA (clause viii), and unlimited RP permission if Total Leverage ≤ 4.50x with no EoD (clause xiv). EoD blocker properly noted. Also captures management buyback basket (clause vi) with the greater of $20M or 20% EBITDA. Junior Financing prepayment provisions at 5.00x Total Leverage also noted. Slight deduction: response mentions 6.0% IPO proceeds basket but the core mechanics are all present.
criteria.reasoning: Strong coverage of RP mechanics. EoD blocker properly noted. Also captures management buyback basket (clause vi) with the greater of $20M or 20% EBITDA. Junior Financing prepayment provisions at 5.00x Total Leverage also noted. Slight deduction: response mentions 6.0% IPO proceeds basket but the core mechanics are all present.
criteria.description: Captures RP starter and builder baskets, general basket, leverage-based exception, and EoD blocker from Section 4.06

criteria.details: Human score: 0.85 - Solid coverage. Correctly captures 75% cash consideration requirement for sales exceeding greater of $50M or 5% EBITDA, 450-day application period, 180-day extension for Acceptable Commitments, $100M excess proceeds threshold triggering Asset Sale Offer at 100% of principal plus accrued interest, and waterfall to Notes/Senior Credit Facilities/First Lien Obligations when Collateral disposed. Properly notes exceptions for Permitted Asset Swaps, Sale Leasebacks, and Multiplex dispositions. Good detail on deemed cash treatment including Designated Non-Cash Consideration up to 5% of Consolidated Total Assets.

criteria.details: Human score: 0.90 - Comprehensive coverage. Correctly identifies 101% offer price plus accrued interest, 60-day notice requirement, 20-60 Business Day payment window with delay provisions for conditions precedent, 10 Business Day withdrawal deadline, and 90% clean-up call allowing redemption of remaining Notes at same price within 60 days. Third-party offer permitted if approved by Company. Properly notes that offer may be conditional on Change of Control occurrence and may be combined with consent solicitation.

criteria.details: Human score: 0.80 - Good coverage of key provisions. Correctly captures equal and ratable lien requirement from Section 4.07 (or senior if lien secures Junior Financing), automatic release upon Initial Lien release. Future guarantor trigger from Section 4.10 correctly identified as guaranteeing Credit Facility debt >$250M or capital markets debt >$250M requires Note guarantee within 60 days. Negative pledge in Section 4.09 mentioned with appropriate carve-outs. Could include more detail on the specific carve-outs to the negative pledge restrictions.
